Name: MoghVR
About the game: Mogh is a fast-paced arcade-style magical combat simulation. The players have an arsenal of magical projectiles and shields at their disposal to fend off hordes of enemies. The core mechanic of the game is combining different energy sources and elements to create a variety of spells. Each spell has its unique perk that affects each different type of enemies due to their physic, their armor type, or even their weight. The player has to manage the energy pool by carefully choosing the right spell to cast, and by aiming it accurately. As the game progress. the player can purchase a variety of items and potions to enhance the experience in a personal way. After finishing the campaign, the arcade section would be unlocked, and the player can experience a never-ending battle and compete to add their name in the global leaderboard. Note: The early release version is focused on getting as much feedback as possible. All the feedbacks will eventually help us to understand the taste of the gamers, and give us a path to expand the game for the better.
